reference.shortdesc: The term element identifies words that might have or require extended definitions or explanations.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The keyref attribute can be used to associate a term with a resource, typically a definition of the term. The keyref attribute can also be used to supply the text content for term using standard keyref processing for variable text.
